title: Welcome to my Website !
name: Ng Zhao Hui
shortIntro: Hi! I'm Zhao Hui, a third year computer science student passionate about new technologies to build maintainable and scalable systems. I aim to specialize in financial technologies.
passion: I love building projects that are unique and complex which challenges me to learn more everyday.
goal: I aim to build maintainable, scalable and bug-free projects to solve real-world problems and continue learning new technologies everyday.
